creditline: Gift of Richard L. Simmons in honor of Lotus Stack
description: long V-neck; pullover style; long sleeves; top front and back decorated with bright multicolored embroidery (predominantly red and pink); cross stitch; checkerboards, zigzags and geometric designs; thin blue zigzag stitching in horizontal line from under PR shoulder down to hem; two rows of red cording at hem
title: Dress
